title: Deep sea drilling project
creator_credit: Jack Robinson and National Science Foundation
brief_description: Shows how ocean bottom cores are obtained and what they tell about the drifting of continents throughout the ages. Documents the voyages of the Clomar Challenger, a new class of drilling ship able to probe deep beneath the floors of the oceans.
